interactions: m_c saw r_c being considerate.
m_c mews congratulations to r_c for a job well done.
m_c wants to be just like r_c someday.
m_c admires how brave r_c is.
m_c is sparring with r_c.
m_c has a mock battle with r_c.
m_c watched r_c show kindness and compassion towards their patients.
m_c caught a glimpse of r_c caring for a wounded warrior with confidence and grace.
m_c spent some time hanging out with r_c in the medicine den.
m_c hopes r_c knows how grateful they are to have them as a medicine cat.
m_c went to r_c for advice about a dream they had.
m_c escorted r_c so they could gather herbs.
m_c thought of r_c on the last patrol and brought an herb back with them.
m_c notices that r_c is trying really hard to be a great medicine cat.
m_c is suddenly struck by the thought of how much r_c does to keep the Clan healthy.
m_c thanks r_c for keeping the Clan healthy.
m_c watches r_c sort herbs as they chat about how their day has gone.
m_c lets r_c know that they're about to go out and asks if they need to watch for any herbs.
m_c asks r_c if there's any herbs they should look out for while they're out on patrol later.
m_c wants to become just like r_c someday!
m_c is pretending to be r_c.
m_c always wants to play as r_c in their games of pretend.
m_c tells r_c that they would like to be like them when they grows up.
m_c is feeling proud of r_c.
m_c is watching r_c perform an almost-decent hunting crouch.
m_c is wowed by how well r_c did today!
m_c feels like they'll never accomplish as much as r_c.
m_c thinks r_c is so much braver than them.
m_c saw r_c show off a skill they never knew they had.
m_c is wowed by how bravely r_c fought the other day.
m_c had a difficult conversation with r_c and they now have a deeper understanding of each other.
m_c defends r_c from a Clanmate's rude remarks.
m_c asks r_c if they're really going to be the leader someday.
m_c saw r_c being rude.
m_c complains about something r_c did.
m_c saw r_c take the last piece of prey from the fresh-kill pile.
m_c thinks r_c has a strange sense of humor.
m_c is frustrated that r_c won't take their actions more seriously.
m_c feels like r_c isn't taking their own personal health seriously.
m_c tried talking to r_c about r_c's behaviour, but it turned into a fight that someone else had to break up.
m_c and r_c had to fix something around camp and argued how to fix it. It ended up being fixed by some other cat.
m_c saw r_c miss an easy catch today.
m_c has noticed r_c isn't doing a lot of work lately.
m_c heard an ugly rumor about r_c.
m_c had a difficult coversation with r_c and they both ended up resentful of each other.
m_c was distracted while r_c was telling a story.
